hanzi-su-wiki:
液

Значения

Жидкость, раствор

Мнемоника

Жидкость 氵, выделяемая организмом ночью 夜 особенно интенсивно — моча, поллюции и т.д.
purpleculture_pinyin:
yè
liquid; fluid; Taiwan pr. [yi4]
жидкость; жидкость; Тайвань пр. [yi4]
rtega_mnemonic:
液液RSsap, juice, liquid, fluid
  • juicy liquid 氵 consumed during the night 夜
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 夜 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
血液 [ xuè yè ]: blood
溶液 [ róng yè ]: solution (chemistry)
液体 [ yè tǐ ]: liquid
液晶 [ yè jīng ]: liquid crystal
输液 [ shū yè ]: intravenous infusion; to get put on an IV
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 夜 [ yè ] night, dark; under cover of night
heisig_chinese_memo: Night water sounds like a wet dream........ liquid that comes out at night while you're in bed....
heisig_constituent: fluid, water, water droplets, water pistol, night, top hat, person, walking legs, drop
koohiiStory1: A wet dream........water fluid that comes out at night....
koohiiStory2: I imagined some kind of liquid (water) that was discovered on another planet. It solidifes during the day, and becomes fluid only at night, in the absence of light. The question is, could any lifeforms thrive in there ?
jp_example_words:
液(えき): liquid, fluid
溶液(ようえき): solution (liquid)
液体(えきたい): liquid, fluid
血液(けつえき): blood
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami that hits at night leaves even more fluid than normal. It's dark at night, so the sun isn't there to help evaporate all that tsunami liquid.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the dark fluids from the tsunami flowing by your window at night. You look out and the liquid is shining in the moonlight. It looks like an entire sea is out there!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This fluid stays in the 駅 (えき) longer than anywhere else. All of those tsunami liquids pour deep inside the 駅 late at night and the sun still can't reach them to help evaporate them during the day. It's a real *night*mare.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the 駅 filled to the brim with fluids and liquids. Maybe if you swim, you'll be able to catch your train.
Ru_Radicals: 亠 (крышка), 化 (превращаться), 夕 (вечер), 汁 (суп), 攵 (складной стул)
Ru_trainchinese:
yè: (графема) жидкость, влага, сок
yè: (сущ) (кит. мед.) соки тела, жидкости тела
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the night (夜) water (氵) is a fluid
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Night water sounds like a wet dream........ liquid that comes out at night while you're in bed....
humanum_short_description_en: The inscriptions from " water " and " night " are used as names. Later generations " liquid " means liquid, "Shuowen": "liquid, 𧗁 also. From the water night sound." "Yu Pian": "liquid, Jinya." "Guangyun": "liquid, body fluid."
humanum_short_description: 金文從「水」，「夜」聲，用作人名。後世「液」表示液體，《說文》：「液，𧗁也。从水夜聲。」《玉篇》：「液，津也。」《廣韻》：「液，津液。」

液字的基本解释

液
yè
能流动、有一定体积而没有一定形状的物质：液体。液汁。液晶。液态。血液。精液。溶液。津液。
澄清：“凡为弓，冬析干而春液角”。

液字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yè］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
亦作“洂1”。
(1)液体。
(2)谓冰冻融解；溶化。
(3)渗漏。
(4)浸渍。
(5)润。
(6)通“掖”。参见“液廷”。
(7)姓。古代有道术之士名液客调。见《急就篇》卷一唐颜师古注。

液字的英文翻译

◎ 液
fluid, liquid, succus

液字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　液； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第04
【唐韻】羊益切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】夷益切，?音繹。【說文】?也，?氣液也。【字林】液，汁也。　又淫液，謂音連延不絕之意。【禮·樂記】咏嘆之，淫液之。　又姓。【急就篇】有液容調。　又與掖通。【前漢·王莽傳】液庭尉媵未充。　又【集韻】施隻切。音釋。漬也。【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人凡爲弓，冬析幹而春液角。【註】液讀爲醳。【疏】醳酒之醳，亦漬液之義。　又解散也。【文子·上仁篇】渙乎其若水之液。　又【韻補】叶弋灼切，音龠。【左思·蜀都賦】黍稷油油，稉稻漠漠。指渠口以爲雲門，灑彪池而爲陸澤。雖星畢之滂沱，曾未齊其膏液。澤音託。

考證：〔【說文】盡也，盡氣液也。〕　謹照二盡字皆?字之譌?氣液也見說文血部兩盡字?改?。
液字的源字形

液字的起名意思

能流动，有一定的体积而无一定形状的物质。

liquid
Basic explanation of words
liquid
yè
A substance that can flow, has a certain volume, but does not have a certain shape: liquid. Juice. liquid crystal. Liquid. blood. semen. Solution. body fluid.
Clarification: "Where it is a bow, it is dry in winter and liquid in spring."
liquid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yè］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
Also known as "Liao 1".
(1) Liquid.
(2) It is called freezing and thawing; melting.
(3) Leakage.
(4) Impregnation.
(5) Run.
(6) Through "Ye". See "liquid court".
(7) Last name. In ancient times, there were Taoist scholars who were famous for their tunes. See "Jijiu Pian" Volume 1 of Tang Yanshi's ancient notes.

liquid
Name meaning
A substance that can flow, has a certain volume without a certain shape.
形声字。水(氵)表意,篆书之形像流水,表示汁水;夜(ye)表声,兼表水气常在夜间凝聚成水滴附在物体上。本义
是液体。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода (氵) выражает значение, сценарий печати похож на проточную воду, что означает сок; ночь (ye) выражает звук, а также выражает водяной пар, который ночью часто конденсируется в капли воды и прикрепляется к объектам.
Первоначальное значение жидкое.

Radicals: 氵, 夜  (tsunami, night)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami that hits at night leaves even more fluid than normal. It's dark at night, so the sun isn't there to help evaporate all that tsunami liquid.
Picture the dark fluids from the tsunami flowing by your window at night. You look out and the liquid is shining in the moonlight. It looks like an entire sea is out there!
Reading Mnemonic
This fluid stays in the 駅 (えき) longer than anywhere else. All of those tsunami liquids pour deep inside the 駅 late at night and the sun still can't reach them to help evaporate them during the day. It's a real *night*mare.
Picture the 駅 filled to the brim with fluids and liquids. Maybe if you swim, you'll be able to catch your train.
